ApplicationName.description: The name of the application that the configuration template or environment belongs to.

EnvironmentName.description: The name of the environment to validate the settings against. Condition: You cannot specify both this and a configuration template name.

OptionSettings.description: A list of the options and desired values to evaluate.

TemplateName.description: The name of the configuration template to validate the settings against. Condition: You cannot specify both this and an environment name.
